name: HH_HEIGHT_WEIGHT_HX
description: This table contains audit information for patient height and weight recorded during intake.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_WEIGHT
columns.description: Auditing history of the patient's weight recorded during home care intake.

columns.name: PAT_HEIGHT
columns.description: Auditing history of the patient's height recorded during home care intake.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: Auditing history of the user who edited the patient's weight or height during home care intake.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Auditing history of the instant of edit to a patient's weight or height during home care intake.
